name: The Trapper
description: An area-control Killer, able to apply pressure across the map by placing deadly %bBear Traps%/b for Survivors to step in.

name: The Wraith
description: A stealth Killer, able to cloak and uncloak at the ringing of his %bWailing Bell%/b.

name: The Hillbilly
description: A high-mobility Killer, able to cover large distances in a short amount of time and instantly down Survivors using his %bChainsaw%/b.

name: The Nurse
description: A warping Killer, able to blink through obstacles and quickly close gaps with her power, %bSpencer's Last Breath%/b.

name: The Huntress
description: A ranged Killer, able to throw %bHunting Hatchets%/b at Survivors to injure them from a distance.

name: The Shape
description: A haunting Killer, intent on monitoring Survivors from a distance to feed his power, %bEvil Within%/b. The more he stalks, the stronger and faster he becomes.

name: The Hag
description: A cursed Killer, able to place traps and then teleport to them when activated, using her %bBlackened Catalyst%/b.

name: The Cannibal
description: A chainsaw-wielding Killer, able to trigger a deadly frenzy using %bBubba's Chainsaw%/b, immediately downing anyone in its path.

name: The Doctor
description: A madness-inducing Killer, able to use his power, %bCarter's Spark%/b, to create a static field incapacitating Survivors and eventually causing them to hallucinate and scream in terror, revealing their position.

name: The Nightmare
description: A nightmare Killer, driven to pull Survivors into his dream world using his power, %bDream Demon%/b, in order to be able to maul them and hinder their abilities.

name: The Pig
description: A tormenting Killer, able to crounch into stealth mode, then ambush Survivors from a short distance. She can also apply %bReverse Bear Traps%/b to downed Survivors, forcing them to remove it before the timer runs out, triggering an instant death.

name: The Clown
description: A strategic Killer, able to control and corral survivors by throwing bottles of %bThe Afterpiece Tonic%/b to create clouds of noxious gas that cover large areas for a short amount of time. Survivors intoxicated by the gas are infliced with impaired vision and movement speed, and give away their location by coughing loudly.

name: The Spirit
description: The Spirit is a phase-walking Killer, able to catch Survivors off-guard with her traversal Power, %bYamaoka's Haunting%/b. Her Power allows her to teleport from one place to another without being seen.

name: The Legion
description: A band of merciless Killers, able to rushdown helpless Survivors with their power, %bFeral Frenzy%/b. Attacks made during their frenzy inflict lingering internal damage, downing any Survivors that are not quick enough to react.
